import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create Conversation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/widget/projects/{projectId}/conversation"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new conversation session in the given project. Conversations track individual chat sessions and store custom metadata for analytics and filtering purposes. Each conversation gets a unique ID that must be used for subsequent message exchanges through the ask endpoint.

**Metadata Purpose:**
The optional metadata field allows you to attach custom key-value pairs to conversations. This metadata is stored and can be used to filter conversations in the AI Findr Hub dashboard, enabling better analytics and conversation management. Common use cases include tracking user IDs, session information, conversation sources, or custom categorization tags.

**Next Steps:**
Use the returned conversationId with the `/api/widget/projects/{projectId}/ask` endpoint to send messages.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Project identifier","in":"path","name":"projectId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>

</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"metadata":{"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"description":"Conversation creation request with optional metadata"}}
>

</RequestSchema>
